Policy

Don't be late!

If you are 10 minutes late, there will be a $10 fee added to your bill. If you are 20 minutes late, your appointment will be canceled

Appointment length

Appointment will take 2-3 hours so make sure you set aside time! Also please use the restroom before your appointment.

Cancellation

Please give a 48 hour notice before you cancel or if you need to change your appointment.

Genral policy

Please remove makeup before appointment. No guests!

Fills

Fills should be done every two weeks. After two fills or three weeks, a new set is required.

Deposit

$15 deposit fee is required to secure your spot. Your deposit will go towards your set!
